translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter with Sobhita
sitting in the midst of the mountains;
well trained in their own skills;
taking them and knowing their value,
I do not remember any bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping with knowledge.

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā campakapupphiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā campakapupphiyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: I have done the Buddha’s bidding.”🔽Thus the venerable elder Campaka Flower recited these verses.
The Elder Campaka Flower’s Birth Story is the sixth.
